special_features: Hyper-Fast Scrolling, Easy-Switch Buttons, Long Battery Life
description: The Logitech M720 Triathlon is a versatile wireless mouse designed for multi-device productivity. It features hyper-fast scrolling, making it easy to switch between applications and documents. With easy-switch buttons, you can seamlessly switch between three connected devices. Its long battery life ensures uninterrupted usage. Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux, it's the perfect companion for busy professionals.

The Microsoft Basic Optical Mouse is a straightforward and reliable wired mouse. It features a simple plug-and-play setup for Windows users. Its ambidextrous design ensures comfortable use for both left and right-handed individuals. This mouse is an affordable and practical choice for everyday computing needs.

The HP X500 Wired Mouse is a reliable and functional input device. With its symmetrical design, it's comfortable for both left and right-handed users. The mouse features three buttons and a scroll wheel for easy navigation. It is compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux, making it a versatile choice for various operating systems.
